channel.title: Drops off?
channel.description:
Well, I've been hosting a server for a week now and I've just realized that the drops turn off in PVP somewhere in the night...
I've searched for things that the droptimer could be declared as such as "drops" "drop" "droptimer" but couldn't find anything.
Anyone help?

item.title: Drops off?
item.dc:creator: @joris-rocks joris-rocks
item.description:
@joris-rocks wrote:

just make a command that does dropson and drops off

Read full topic
